mn121:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
mn121:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn121:3.1: “Ekamidam, bhante, samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati nagarakam nama sakyanam nigamo.
mn121:3.2: Tattha me, bhante, bhagavato sammukha sutam, sammukha patiggahitam:
mn121:3.4: Kacci metam, bhante, sussutam suggahitam sumanasikatam supadharitan”ti?
mn121:3.5: “Taggha te etam, ananda, sussutam suggahitam sumanasikatam supadharitam.
mn121:3.6: Pubbepaham, ananda, etarahipi sunnataviharena bahulam viharami.
mn121:4.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, ayam migaramatupasado sunno hatthigavassavalavena, sunno jataruparajatena, sunno itthipurisasannipatena atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—
mn121:4.3: evameva kho, ananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritva gamasannam, amanasikaritva manussasannam, arannasannam paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:4.4: Tassa arannasannaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:4.6: ‘ye assu daratha gamasannam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha manussasannam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—
mn121:4.8: So ‘sunnamidam sannagatam gamasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam manussasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—
mn121:4.10: Iti yanhi kho tattha na hoti tena tam sunnam samanupassati, yam pana tattha avasittham hoti tam ‘santamidam atthi’ti pajanati.
mn121:4.11: Evampissa esa, ananda, yathabhucca avipallattha parisuddha sunnatavakkanti bhavati.
mn121:5.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritva manussasannam, amanasikaritva arannasannam, pathavisannam paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:5.2: Tassa pathavisannaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:5.3: Seyyathapi, ananda, asabhacammam sankusatena suvihatam vigatavalikam;
mn121:5.4: evameva kho, ananda, bhikkhu yam imissa pathaviya ukkulavikkulam nadividuggam khanukantakatthanam pabbatavisamam tam sabbam amanasikaritva pathavisannam paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:5.5: Tassa pathavisannaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:5.7: ‘ye assu daratha manussasannam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha arannasannam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—
mn121:5.9: So ‘sunnamidam sannagatam manussasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam arannasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—
mn121:5.11: Iti yanhi kho tattha na hoti tena tam sunnam samanupassati, yam pana tattha avasittham hoti tam ‘santamidam atthi’ti pajanati.
mn121:5.12: Evampissa esa, ananda, yathabhucca avipallattha parisuddha sunnatavakkanti bhavati.

mn121:7.2: Tassa vinnanancayatanasannaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:7.4: ‘ye assu daratha pathavisannam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha akasanancayatanasannam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—

mn121:9.1: Puna caparam, ananda bhikkhu amanasikaritva vinnanancayatanasannam, amanasikaritva akincannayatanasannam, nevasannanasannayatanasannam paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:9.2: Tassa nevasannanasannayatanasannaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:9.4: ‘ye assu daratha vinnanancayatanasannam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha akincannayatanasannam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—
mn121:9.6: So ‘sunnamidam sannagatam vinnanancayatanasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam akincannayatanasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—

mn121:10.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritva akincannayatanasannam, amanasikaritva nevasannanasannayatanasannam, animittam cetosamadhim paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:10.2: Tassa animitte cetosamadhimhi cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:10.4: ‘ye assu daratha akincannayatanasannam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha nevasannanasannayatanasannam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—
mn121:10.6: So ‘sunnamidam sannagatam akincannayatanasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam nevasannanasannayatanasannaya’ti pajanati, ‘atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—
mn121:10.8: Iti yanhi kho tattha na hoti tena tam sunnam samanupassati, yam pana tattha avasittham hoti tam ‘santamidam atthi’ti pajanati.
mn121:10.9: Evampissa esa, ananda, yathabhucca avipallattha parisuddha sunnatavakkanti bhavati.
mn121:11.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu amanasikaritva akincannayatanasannam, amanasikaritva nevasannanasannayatanasannam, animittam cetosamadhim paticca manasi karoti ekattam.
mn121:11.2: Tassa animitte cetosamadhimhi cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
mn121:11.5: ‘Yam kho pana kinci abhisankhatam abhisancetayitam tadaniccam nirodhadhamman’ti pajanati.
mn121:11.6: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati.
mn121:11.8: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
mn121:12.2: ‘ye assu daratha kamasavam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha bhavasavam paticca tedha na santi, ye assu daratha avijjasavam paticca tedha na santi, atthi cevayam darathamatta yadidam—
mn121:12.4: So ‘sunnamidam sannagatam kamasavena’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam bhavasavena’ti pajanati, ‘sunnamidam sannagatam avijjasavena’ti pajanati, ‘atthi cevidam asunnatam yadidam—
mn121:12.6: Iti yanhi kho tattha na hoti tena tam sunnam samanupassati, yam pana tattha avasittham hoti tam ‘santamidam atthi’ti pajanati.
mn121:12.7: Evampissa esa, ananda, yathabhucca avipallattha parisuddha paramanuttara sunnatavakkanti bhavati.
mn121:13.1: Yepi hi keci, ananda, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharimsu, sabbe te imamyeva parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharimsu.
mn121:13.2: Yepi hi keci, ananda, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharissanti, sabbe te imamyeva parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharissanti.
mn121:13.3: Yepi hi keci, ananda, etarahi samana va brahmana va parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharanti, sabbe te imamyeva parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharanti.
mn121:13.4: Tasmatiha, ananda, ‘parisuddham paramanuttaram sunnatam upasampajja viharissama’ti—
mn121:13.7: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
